conclusion: The green fabric surface provides a flat terrain for the toy car to move on.
The car is moving from the right towards the blocks in the center.
There are several clusters of blocks in various colors and sizes.
The car is initially directed towards the cluster of blocks in the center.
The car will first encounter the green and blue blocks on the upper right side.
The car collides with the green block, causing it to move slightly.
The car continues forward but may be deflected slightly.
The car is then likely to hit the blue blocks next.
The blue blocks may absorb some of the car's momentum, possibly causing slight deflection or displacement of the blocks.
As the car moves through the blocks, it loses momentum due to collisions and friction.
The car comes to a stop near the blue and green blocks in the center area.
